verbs.description: [ARG0: A New York lawyer] [V: said] [ARG1: he told President Donald Trump 's attorney , Michael Cohen , years ago that former New York Attorney General Eric Schneiderman was abusing women . Schneiderman , a frequent legal nemesis] ...
